hero.name: Jekyll & Hyde
hero.specialAbility: Start the game as Dr. Jekyll. At the start of your turn, you may transform into Dr. Jekyll or Mr. Hyde.While Mr. Hyde: After you Maneuver, take 1 damage.Use the transformation token to indicate what he currently is.

cards.title: Feint
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

cards.title: Skirmish
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

cards.title: Duality of Man
cards.duringText: If you are Dr. Jekyll and playing this card to defend, this card's value is 6 instead. If you are Mr. Hyde and playing this card to attack, this card's value is 6 instead.

cards.title: Distracted Triage
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, recover 2 health.

cards.title: Succumb to Compulsion
cards.afterText: Move up to 2 spaces. Transform to Mr. Hyde.

cards.title: Recoiling Blow
cards.afterText: Place Mr. Hyde in any space in his zone. Transform to Dr. Jekyll.

cards.title: Forever Hyde
cards.duringText: You may discard Dr. Jekyll cards. Add 2 to this card's value for each card discarded.

cards.title: With Haste!
cards.afterText: Move Dr. Jekyll up to 4 spaces.

cards.title: Scientific Method
cards.afterText: Draw a number of cards equal to the damage you were dealt.

cards.title: Calming Research
cards.basicText: Recover 2 health. Draw up to 3 cards. Keep one and put any others on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.title: Strange Case
cards.basicText: Reveal the top card of your deck. Deal damage equal to its BOOST value to one adjacent fighter. Put the card in your hand.

cards.title: Pure Evil
cards.basicText: Place Mr. Hyde in any space in his zone. Mr. Hyde deals 2 damage to all adjacent fighters.
